content: this is an original chart i created for duplicate stitching over an already knit sweater but it could be used as a grid for crocheting or for cross stitching it assumes you have at least 54 stitches width wise for the lettering and 35 row for the lettering feel free to pay $5 and i ll donate 50% to help local immigrants affected by ice but this pattern is also posted for free on my instagram @thekninch -
